page.title: 07 Matthews Day,(Age 10)
page.content: At 7:56 I get up,put on my school uniform and go to breakfast at 8:00. I usually eat a bowl of Frosties or bread and marmalade with a cup of tea. At 8:25 I go upstairs,clean my teeth, comb my hair and put my shoes on,then I pack my bag,and walk to school at 8:45. School begins at 8:55 ;after the register we have assembly when we sing,have a story and say some prayers. Then we return to our classroom to collect our equipment for maths.After maths we put our things away and go out to play.In the summer we go out on the school field and in the winter the playground. At 10:45 we come back into our classroom. We then have English until 12:00,after which the 11+ children have French and the 10+ have music, nature or drama. We go to lunch from 12:25 onward depending on our turn.
